name: Fists of Magic
description:
Your feud with the Space Wizard  has come to a crescendo as they've finally transported you to an extradimensional realm, where you are swarmed by their minions. Luckily your area of expertise, magical boxing, comes in great to defeat all that oppose you.

Controls: Keyboard Controller

Use Alt + f4 to close the game

Team: 

Programming: Cas Trines, Bart van Dongen, Conor Damery Mendez
Visual Arts: Axel Cremers,  Kim Trouwborst, Roselyn Payne, Viktória Čižíkov
Design: Andrei Gheorghe, Eileen van Zijtveld, Katelin van Lissum, Tudor Boneanu

This project has been made in 3 weeks during Block 2 of Year 2 of the Creative Media and Game Technologies course of Breda University of applied sciences.
